title: Sand and Soul, Emotional Cheating, Steve Cuts Grass, Las Vegas Slogan and more.
itunes:title: Sand and Soul, Emotional Cheating, Steve Cuts Grass, Las Vegas Slogan and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today's show is dedicated to those that go down to the beach and pee in the water. Find out who is the resident instigator and which two members are ready to fight. We go from emotional cheating to whose chooses who in one second flat. What would you say to your boss if you won the lottery? Who got their asses whooped because somebody told on them? Steve tells a story about cutting grass. Will Las Vegas change its slogan? Sand and Soul has the last deal of the year just for you. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO tells us about the bad side of blame and excuses, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
